text: He might be a father - of - four, but Brian Austin Green isn't done with fatherhood just yet. In fact the Beverly Hills, 90210 star is making plans to have a fifth child - although he would prefer a girl, if he's honest.'I want a girl,'Green admitted in an interview with Hollywood Pipeline's Dax Holt.'I really want a girl.'Noah, four, Bodhi, three, and Journey, one.'I really want a girl!'Brian Austin Green would love another baby with Megan Fox... making him a father of five ; the couple are seen in July with sons Noah, four, Bodhi, three, and Journey, one Green has 15 - year - old son Kassius, from a previous relationship and
